A

Abort - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
A restart which indicates the wish to abort execution and unwind the stack.
Abort() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Abort
Creates a new instance.
AbortException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
Thrown by Abort to interrupt processing, and unwind the stack until captured.
AbortException() - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.AbortException
 
apply(Restart.Option) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Abort
Throws an exception.
apply(Restart.Option) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume
Resumes have no meaningful value to "return"; so this method returns a "garbage" object, to be ignored.

C

call(Supplier<T>, Restart...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Evaluates body, providing additional restarts for it.
close() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Updates the scope nesting when execution leaves the try block.
Condition - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents an unusual situation, which the running code doesn't know how to deal with, but the code that called it might.
Condition() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Condition
 
create() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scopes
Creates and returns a new instance, nested in the (now former) current scope.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Abort

equals(Object) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume

getAllRestarts() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope

The Scope instance wrapping this one.
getRestartOption() - Method in exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.RestartNotFoundException

getScope() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations

H

Establishes a new handler in this scope.
Handler - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Handles conditions, producing the result to be returned by signal.
Handler.Decision - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
How a handler decided to handle a condition.
Handler.Operations - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
The ways a handler can handle a condition.

N

Notice - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions
This class and its subclasses are unchecked conditions, meaning that if no handler is found, they don't error out.
Notice() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions.Notice
 

O

on(Class<S>, Function<O, ?>) - Static method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Restart
Creates and returns a new restart, with a default implementation.
onHandlerNotFound(Scope) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Condition
Called when no handler was found.
onHandlerNotFound(Scope) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions.Notice
This implementation does nothing.
onHandlerNotFound(Scope) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions.Warning
Prints a message to the given print stream.
org.sbrubbles.conditio - package org.sbrubbles.conditio
Provides an implementation of a simple condition system.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.conditions
Provides some general use conditions, which enable alternative handling protocols.
org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts - package org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
Provides some general use restarts.

R

restart(Restart.Option) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
Invokes a previously set recovery strategy.
Restart - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents a recovery strategy.
Restart.Option - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Serves both as input for restarts, and a way to select which restart to use: the earliest-bound one in the stack which accepts it.
RestartNotFoundException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown when no working restart for a given restart option was found.
RestartNotFoundException(Restart.Option) - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.RestartNotFoundException
Creates a new instance.
Resume - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts
A restart which indicates that execution may proceed "without" returning a value.
Resume() - Constructor for class org.sbrubbles.conditio.restarts.Resume
Creates a new instance.

S

Scope - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
The resource providing the main machinery.
Scopes - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Manages the stack of nested scopes.
signal(Condition, Restart...) - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Signals a situation which the currently running code doesn't know how to deal with.
skip() - Method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler.Operations
When a handler opts to not handle a particular condition.
